Title: Gardening with a Wild Heart.
Subtitle: Restoring California's Native Landscapes at Home.
Authors: Judith Larner Lowry.

Description: Essays discuss wildflower gardening, the ecology of native grasses, wildland seed collecting, principles of natural design, and plant/animal interactions for California gardens..
